attributes.title: uhhhhhh
attributes.review: i downloaded this app but every time i tried to open it it crashed and locked me out. it then made all my other apps lock me out. i had to end up deleting it and FINALLY my apps went back to normal.

attributes.title: WORST APP ON APPLE !!!!
attributes.review: once i downloaded this app to support my oh so smart president it kept glitching and made my battery go down when i tried to launch it. it also mad my phone super hot. i do not recommend 0/10. if i could rate a zero i would 😡😡

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: 0/10 terrible service. food is gross and the waiters got my order wrong TWICE. the rollercoaster line was like 1000 people!! took so long. the clothes didnt fit and were too big. like come on they should have small sizes too😩 trump is a terrible manager!!!!👿👿👿👿

attributes.title: 🧚🏾💫🌟🧚🏼‍♀️✨🧚🏾🌺🌸💞

attributes.title: NO
attributes.review: This app is trash I tried to download it 97 times and it’s still not working there’s a bunch of glitches in it and hateful things it glitched out my phone for an entire day and I hate it this app is racist and unthinkable it needs to be deleted

attributes.title: MUST READ
attributes.review: This app took WAY too long to download! I was trying to stay informed on the news and Trumps updates, especially about Covid, and when I tried to get into the app, my phone shut down! I WISH i could give this app 0 STARS

attributes.title: The app is going to track you!!
attributes.review: It’s a scam so the government can follow your every move. They’re hiding behind a rewards program to do this? As an American, I believe in the right to privacy. How is this any better than what the libtards are doing??

attributes.title: I AM UNCOMFORTABLE
attributes.review: I hate that an app would want so much of my information. Why does it need my phone number and where does all of this info go??? I want to stay up to date, but not at the expense of my data being sold to CHINA. Not cool. I regret downloading this app.

attributes.title: Putridddd 🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮
attributes.review: This app took exactly 2 weeks, 6 days, 21 hours, 43 minutes and 26 seconds to download. That is absolutely unacceptable. And on top of that, when I opened the app my phone crashed for exactly 1 week, 4 days, 17 hours, 36 minutes and 42 seconds

attributes.title: #safe barren
attributes.review:
If you are reading this I am dead 

As soon as I opened I felt a cool sprit live my body, I think it was the Holy Ghost. I was very scared but decided to keep going for my president that loves me and I love him so much. I was hoping to get a chance to sign a Petition to get Barren out of the claws of his father.
